articles.title: Astronomers uncover largest group of 'rogue planets' yet - Ahmedabad Mirror
articles.description:
A team of astronomers, using data from several European Southern Observatory (ESO) telescopes and other facilities, has discovered at least 70 new rogue planets in our galaxy.
